Entities.Name: LVEF Mention
Entities.Definition: Mentions of left ventricular ejection fraction in clinical text. These include standard forms and abbreviations such as 'EF' or full phrases like 'left ventricular ejection fraction'.

Entities.Name: LVSF Mention
Entities.Definition: Mentions of left ventricular systolic function. This category includes general references to systolic function or dysfunction.

Entities.Name: LVSF Qualitative Value
Entities.Definition: Descriptive, qualitative assessments of LVSF measurements.

Entities.Name: LVEF Quantitative Value
Entities.Definition: Numerical values or ranges that quantify LVEF measurements.

Dataset.Name: TUCP EF Year 3 Corpus
Dataset.Description: A collection of 3060 VA clinical reports (Echocardiography, Radiology, TIU), with 1465 annotated for LVEF information using a standardized schema. The corpus was used to train and evaluate new sequence-tagging models.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Clinical notes were annotated using a BIO-tag format. Concepts were annotated by two independent reviewers and adjudicated by a domain expert. Special attention was paid to ensure consistent term boundary definitions across corpora. Distinctions between LVEF and LVSF mentions were emphasized in the TUCP EF Year 3 schema.
